1.0.name: wordpress/events-handler
1.0.description:
The plugin features a straight forward user interface in the Wordpress dashboard to add/edit and delete events and set some options. Many more options are available and Events is completely customizable to your theme in an easy and flexible manner.

Features

  • Supports single and multiple day events
  • Create weekly and monthly repeating events
  • Display upcoming events by month for future months
  • Easily customize the styles from WP-backend settings page
  • Front-end Calendar month navigation is driven by AJAX
  • Ability to add calendar to your theme via shortcode or template tag
  • Integrated PayPal to accept payments for paid events and setup limited space events!
  • Custom Language Text Support
  • Management page
  • Add Tickets to Events
  • Accept Bookings to Events
  • And more, see for yourself...
